page.title: 18Science & Technology Helford
page.content:
In the Home_ A small number of families use microwave ovens. Home computers used by younger members for school homework and games.
Horticulture and Flower farming _ Bulbs are steam sterilized and freeze cooled for early production.
Farming _ Computer programme feeding of cattle is becoming more widely used on larger farms. So too is modern machinery. Herbicides, pesticides and insecticides are used to improve the quality and quantity of the crops.
School _ Computer used in local school.
